arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim's reaction to Man United's last-minute penalty against Burnley goes viral just days after he was slated for sitting on the bench during their shoot-out loss to Grimsby
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim has received attention for his reaction to his side's last minute penalty against Burnley.

arts.ttl: Forget Bruno Fernandes, Man Utd fans hail 'absolute diamond' after 3-2 win over Burnley
Man Utd rescued by added-time Bruno Fernandes penalty in victory over Burnley
arts.sum: United had let slip two leads at Old Trafford before captain Fernandes kept his cool to earn a much-needed victory.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Mark Clattenburg questions possible PGMOL change after penalty incident in Man Utd vs Burnley
Man United suffer blow as Matheus Cunha has to go off injured against Burnley with Benjamin Sesko snubbed by Ruben Amorim in bizarre decision
arts.sum: Manchester United star Matheus Cunha had to be substituted due to injury during the first half of his side's game at home to Burnley. Cunha was withdrawn in the 31st minute at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Agony for Amorim as Man United ace suffers injury in Burnley clash
arts.sum: Manchester United suffer an injury blow in the first half of their Premier League clash against Burnley, with Matheus Cunha forced off.

arts.ttl: Man Utd half-time ratings from must-win Premier League clash at home to Burnley
arts.sum: Man Utd's half-time player ratings from their must-win Premier League clash at home to Burnley

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Premier League Match Centre explains reason Man Utd were denied Burnley penalty
arts.sum: Kyle Walker was adjudged to have fouled Mason Mount in the early stages of Burnley's trip to Manchester United but a VAR review resulted in no penalty, leaving home fans furious

arts.ttl: Kobbie Mainoo is on the Man United bench AGAIN for Burnley clash - as wantaway midfielder looks to leave despite Ruben Amorim urging him to stay and fight for his place
arts.sum: Kobbie Mainoo has been named on the bench again for Manchester United's game at home to Burnley. Mainoo informed the club this week that he wants to leave on loan before the transfer deadline.
